definition: Adventures of Tom Sawyer by Mark Twain

sentences.english: " Indeed, " Geocentric Adventure" is in theaters Not quiet.
sentences.chinese: 确实，《地心历险记》的放映厅里很不安静。

sentences.english: "An onion adventure" will lead the children into the the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 《洋葱头历险记》会带领孩子走进这个奇妙的世界。

sentences.english: Tog in these countries began a series of magical adventure.
sentences.chinese: 来克在这些国家里开始了一系列神奇的历险。

sentences.english: Listening to him talk about his adventure in China was a real eye-opener.
sentences.chinese: 听他谈在中国的历险令人大开眼界。

sentences.english: A good critic is one who narrates the adventures of his mind among masterpieces.
sentences.chinese: 好的批评家是个讲述自己的精神在杰作中历险的人。

sentences.english: These advertisements are calculated to appeal to young men thirsting for adventure.
sentences.chinese: 这些广告意在吸引渴望历险的年轻人。

sentences.english: Without exception, the earliest colonial ventures were unprofitable.
sentences.chinese: 早期殖民历险无一例外地无利可图。

sentences.english: For Shumlin, even a mud puddle can make for an adventure
sentences.chinese: 就算是一个小泥潭，也能被宣林演绎成历险的乐园。

sentences.english: Just before Jim got to the story about Erny going to school, the phone rang.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆刚读到恩尼上学历险记时，电话铃响了。

sentences.english: What had started as a walk at night to the outhouse had turned into a life and death adventure!
sentences.chinese: 半夜上厕所竟成了一场生死犹关的历险。

sentences.english: Listening to aim talk about his adventure in China was a real eye-opener .
sentences.chinese: 听他谈在中国的历险令人大开眼界。

sentences.english: Until modern times,a trip was often a long and difficult adventure.
sentences.chinese: 直到近代，旅行还常常是个漫长而又艰难的历险。

sentences.english: Listening to him talk about hisnadventure in China was a real eye-opener .
sentences.chinese: 听他谈在中国的c历险令人大开眼界。

sentences.english: He is adventuring in order to find his authentic existence.
sentences.chinese: 他历险的目的是为了找到真实自我的存在。

sentences.english: But let me to my fortune and the caskets .
sentences.chinese: 但是带我去那首饰盒旁，历险吧。

sentences.english: And so began my mother’s adventure in the world of computers.
sentences.chinese: 从此，妈妈开始了在电脑世界中的历险。

definition: to explore/to go on an expedition/adventure
to set foot on/to step on or into
to float on the current/to drift along or about/rafting
